actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt septic tank pumping units from the manufactures excise tax on automotive and related items.

summary.text: Exempts, under the Internal Revenue Code, septic tank pumping units from the manufacturers excise tax on automotive and related items.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt septic tank pumping units from the manufactures excise tax on automotive and related items.
